rooms.description: A welcoming space that adheres to Vastu principles by facing the main entrance eastwards.
A spacious area with natural light; features Bohemian decor elements and open-plan layout for social gatherings.
Adjacent to the living room, designed with a farmhouse aesthetic incorporating wooden finishes and vintage accents.
An open kitchen layout that is efficient and integrates seamlessly with the dining area; includes modern appliances on a tight budget.
A cozy guest bedroom ensuring privacy; large window for ample natural light as per Vastu guidelines.
The largest bedroom with a private balcony offering expansive views of the garden and east-facing light.
A well-lit room featuring a spacious balcony; designed in Bohemian style with local artisan touches.
Sufficient space for additional privacy; window placement optimized for light and Vastu alignment.
A dedicated fitness area on the ground floor with natural lighting and ventilation to promote health and wellness.

openings.description: An inviting entrance with a large foyer that complies with Vastu principles by facing east for auspicious entry.
Each bedroom features its own balcony overlooking the garden, ensuring privacy and natural light.
Strategically placed windows in all rooms for optimum daylight as per Vastu guidelines.
Openable panels leading to a garden area that enhances the farmhouse aesthetic and provides natural ventilation.
